summary: An evil hyponotist/ventriloquist plots to gain an heiress' millions.
cast: Bryant Haliday|William Sylvester|Yvonne Romain|Sandra Dorne|Nora Nicholson|Alan Gifford|Karel Stepanek|Francis De Wolff|Anthony Baird|David Charlesworth|Lorenza Colville|Sadie Corre|Trixie Dallas|Guy Deghy|Margaret Durnell|Heidi Erich|Gerry Judge|Ray Landor|Pamela Law|Colin McKenzie|Jackie Ramsden|Philip Ray|Pat Ryan|Ian Selby|John Tatham|Oliver Tomlin|Ella Tracey
title: El muñeco diabólico
